All Implemented Interfaces:

public class ResourceCard extends PlaceableCard
This class represents all the resource cards.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints(PlayerTable playerTable)
      This method returns the points given to the player after placing a specific resource card on the board.
      Overrides:
      getPoints in class PlaceableCard
      Parameters:
      playerTable - : the player table of the player that placed the card.
      Returns:
      : the number of points obtained.

    • getThisPoints

      public int getThisPoints()
      This method returns the points attribute. If the card is placed on the back, it gives no points; otherwise, it returns the number of points specified by the respective attribute.
      Returns:
      : the number of points obtained.

    • updateResourceCounter

      Parameters:

    • resourceCentreBackToString

      public String resourceCentreBackToString()
      This method returns the resourceCentreBack attribute formatted using ASCII escape codes. Used for printing resource cards in the CLI.
      Returns:
      : the resourceCentreBack attribute formatted using ASCII escape codes.
